extractFactDictList.sentence: "A League of Their Own" is a 1992 American sports comedy-drama film that tells the story of the All-American Girls Professional Baseball League (AAGPBL), a women's professional baseball league that operated from 1943 to The film, which was directed by Penny Marshall and stars Geena Davis, Lori Petty, and Tom Hanks, is set in the 1940s and 1950s and depicts the challenges faced by the players as they navigate the male-dominated sport and try to prove themselves on the field.
